titleStmt.title: The revengeful mistress being an amorous adventure of an English gentleman in Spain : in which are also contain'd three other novels, viz. The wrong'd innocence clear'd, The generous imposter, and The unfortunate collonel / writ. by Ph. Ayres.
titleStmt.author: Ayres, Philip, 1638-1712.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
